dsOverview.title: Warren's Global Climatological Cloud Data, 1930-1983Nov

summary.p: Total cloud cover and cloud type amounts over both land and ocean, based on data from FNOC and COADS.

p.font:
Superseded by the Extended Edited Synoptic Cloud Report Archive. See RELATED DATASETS
below.
